Club Constitution

The governing constitution and rules of Greystones Sailing Club

The Constitution of Greystones Sailing Club sets out the fundamental rules and governance structure that guide our club operations, membership, and activities.

Constitution Document

The full constitution document is available for download and contains detailed information about club governance, membership rights and responsibilities, committee structure, and club procedures.

Key Information

For questions about the constitution or club governance, please contact our Honorary Secretary at secretary@gsc.ie

Greystones Sailing Club

Ireland's premier sailing club, established in 1937. Located in the beautiful Greystones Harbor, County Wicklow.
